title: John Basile - No Apologies - Jazz Guitar, Jazz Organ
description:
John Basile - No Apologies - Jazz Guitar, Jazz Organ

Jazz Guitarist John Basile return to the roots and present a soulful organ based collection of standards, originals, latin, and 70's pop tunes in a release entitled 'No Apologies'. Featuring Pat Bianchi on the organ and Carmen Intorre on drums.


Label: Stringtime Jazz 5637600593
Release Date Aug 23, 2012

Jazz Guitarist John Basile and StringTime Jazz return to the roots and present a soulful organ based collection of standards, originals, latin, and 70's pop tunes in a new CD release entitled "No Apologies". For this project we wanted to approach the music, choice of musicians, and conception totally from an organic (figuratively and literally), back to basics approach, and work with material that I felt was complete in representing my experience in all styles of music over the years". "No Apologies", features Pat Bianchi on the organ and Carmen Intorre on drums , two of the most exciting voices in modern jazz today. The music incorporates the rich tradition of organ based, straight-ahead jazz with a contemporary approach that results in an entertaining, no nonsense blend of material guaranteed to satisfy any listener.
